item.title: Planetario
item.description: Explore 3 destinies, The Moon, Mars and Asteroid:AM06US and learn about their human discoveries, achievements, history and mysteries. With the help of the 'Planetario Administrator', up to 30 users can join the experience and the host can control when they're ready to explore!

item.title: Training Software
item.description: Train your personnel in industrial vehicles, equipment and production lines in VR!

item.title: Sonora Tourism
item.description: Watch an amazing scenery of iconic landmarks of Sonora, get aboard a hot balloon and choose between 3 destinies, San Carlos, Pinacate and Puerto Pe√±asco. Once you arrive, get ready to watch an inmersive video!
